  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.PatternConverter

    @Plugin(name="ExtendedWhitespaceThrowablePatternConverter",
        category="Converter")
public final class ExtendedWhitespaceThrowablePatternConverter
extends org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.ThrowablePatternConverter
    ThrowablePatternConverter that adds some additional whitespace around the stack trace.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.3.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • format

        public void format(org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LogEvent event,
                   StringBuilder buffer)
        从类复制的说明: org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.ThrowablePatternConverter
        Formats an event into a string buffer.
        覆盖:
        format 在类中 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.ThrowablePatternConverter
        参数:
        event - event to format, may not be null.
        buffer - string buffer to which the formatted event will be appended. May not be null.

      • newInstance

        public static ExtendedWhitespaceThrowablePatternConverter newInstance(org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Configuration configuration,
                                                                      String[] options)
        Creates a new instance of the class. Required by Log4J2.
        参数:
        configuration - current configuration
        options - pattern options, may be null. If first element is "short", only the first line of the throwable will be formatted.
        返回:
        a new WhitespaceThrowablePatternConverter
